question: i have sprengels shoulder, klippel feil syndrome, double scolosis, scherrmans disease and diabetes.  C6-C7, T1-T2 fusion.  I am terible pain.  My life is nothing anymore.  I cannot do ANYTHING.  The pain is literally killing me.  Every doctor i have seen says the conditions do not cause pain.  I need help please. title: KFS
